title: Aloo Gobi 1
steps: Wash and chop all vegetables and ingredients as needed.
Heat oil in a pan over medium flame.
Add chopped onions and sauté until golden brown.
Add ginger, garlic, and other aromatic spices if available, and sauté for a minute.
Add the main ingredients: ginger, beans, capsicum, chicken, soy sauce, coriander, red chilli powder, rice, paneer, garlic. Stir well.
Add spices like red chilli powder, turmeric, or garam masala as needed.
Mix in soy sauce or lemon juice if listed in ingredients.
Cover and cook on medium heat for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Check seasoning and adjust salt if needed.
Garnish with coriander or butter if available.
Serve hot with rice, roti, or as preferred.
